player_news.trend_summary: Lamine Yamal scored a clutch goal in extra time against the Netherlands in the UEFA Nations League Quarterfinals. Spain ultimately advanced to the semi-finals after a dramatic penalty shootout victory, where they will face France.

player_news.trend_summary: Inter Milan's Yann Aurel Bisseck has earned his first call-up to the German national team, a testament to his perseverance. While team news suggests Kleindienst may feature in the second leg of the UEFA Nations League quarterfinal against Italy, Bisseck's specific role remains unconfirmed.

player_news.trend_summary: Michael Olise is making waves for France in the Nations League, even inspiring them to a final four spot after a dramatic quarter-final victory over Croatia, decided on penalties. Furthermore, Franck Ribéry sees Olise as his successor, though a language barrier reportedly hinders Didier Deschamps from forming a close bond with the young player.
